Source.Name: libgnomecanvas2
Source.Summary: The libgnomecanvas package contains the GNOME canvas library.
Source.Description: The libgnomecanvas package contains the GNOME canvas library. It is an engine for structured graphics and one of the essential GNOME libraries.
